page.title: 18Holiday Visitors cont'd
page.content: When asked if they knew of any interesting places in Princetown one man mentioned the names of all the pubs but most people replied,"No", so we told them about the church and the prison. My friend and I had quite a few laughs interviewing people and once we went over to a foreign car and said, "Excuse me,we're doing the Domesday Project for the B.B.C. Could you answer a few questions for us please?" The two people who were by the car started talking in another language. Emma and I looked at each other and said,"Thank you for your time" to the people and hurriedly departed! Most of the visitors were on holiday tour, some were walking the moors and some were campers and they were all kind and friendly.
